origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.fetch_financial_support', 'description': 'This function retrieves financial support details for a specific sector based on the type of support and the time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector for which financial support details are required.'}, {'name': 'supportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial support, such as policy, grants, or loans.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the support, such as latest, annual, or quarterly.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'supportDetails', 'description': 'Details of the financial support provided to the sector.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.fetch_financial_support, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'energy', 'supportType'是'policy', 'timeFrame'是'latest'.
